details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: WCAG 2.2 - 4.1 Compatible - 4.1.2 Name, Role, Value - Heading
details.description: The structure type and attributes of a heading shall be semantically appropriate

rule.description: The structure type and attributes of a heading shall be semantically appropriate

error.message: This node is the single child with content. One of its ancestor nodes should be tagged as heading instead of this one
